      • tryCurrentTasks

        public void tryCurrentTasks​(RoomManager roomManager,
                            Player player,
                            Command command)
        Goes through all stored missions, makes each of them check if the task the player got to has just been satisfied.
        Parameters:
        roomManager - the room manager, vital for checking the task conditions
        player - the player object, vital for checking the task conditions
        command - the player's most recent command
